title: Samples, ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 15 cm [6"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 44 cm [17 1/4"] Selvedge one side, cut other side.
b. Warp: 14 cm [5.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 23 cm [9"] Cut both sides.
creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott
description:
a. red ground with white and pink/orange motifs
b. red ground with pink/orange and gold motifs
